metadata.title: CVE-2012-6125 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Chicken before 4.8.0 is susceptible to algorithmic complexity attacksrelated to hash table collisions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6125` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chicken-bin - 4.8.0-1
libchicken6 - 4.8.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chicken package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.8.0-1').
